title: The Ten Commandments: Parents
description:
Readings from:

Exodus 20:12, 21:15

Leviticus 20:9

Proverbs 10:1, 23:22-25

Ephesians 6:1-3

Today's passages were read by Jordan Poblete, a creative strategist who loves God. More info at https://jordiepoblete.com.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
